FuncDef: This command displays PPPoE session information.
CLIs: session [ interface <ip-int-name> | ip-address | sap <sap-id> ] [ session-id <session-id> ] [ mac <ieee-address> ] [ ip-address <ip-address> [ </mask> ] ] [ port <port-id> ] [ no-inter-dest-id | inter-dest-id <intermediate-destination-id> ] [ steering-profile <steering-profile> ] [ router-advertisement-policy <policy-name> ] [ detail | statistics ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address of the PPPoE session.
Specifies the ID of the PPPoE session.
Specifies the MAC address of the PPPoE session.
Displays the information about no intermediate destination ID.
Specifies the name of the steering profile, up to a maximum of 32 characters.
Specifies the name of the router advertisement policy, up to a maximum of 32 characters.
Displays statistics about the PPPoE session.
